survey.title: AA EXTENDED USE CONCEPT/PRODUCT TEST
survey.introduction: Hello, I'm from (your company), an independent marketing research company. We're conducting a survey with women about various consumer products.

questions.question: Into which of the following age groups does your age belong?

instructions.check_quota: CHECK QUOTA TO DETERMINE IF NEEDED. IF OVER QUOTA, ASK FOR ANOTHER FEMALE IN AGE GROUP NEEDED.

questions.question: Which of the following products do you use daily?
questions.instructions: CONTINUE ONLY IF CIGARETTES CHECKED ABOVE IN Q.2. IF NONE, ASK FOR ANOTHER FEMALE HOUSEHOLD MEMBER 18+ AND GO BACK TO Q.1 OTHERWISE, TERMINATE, ERASE AND RE-USE.

questions.question: Which of the following brands have you used in the past week?
